review: I recently had an excellent experience with Dr. Aashwiin, my dentist. He fixed my dental cavities, performed teeth whitening, and provided aesthetic dentistry services. Dr. Aashwiin's friendliness and professionalism made me feel comfortable throughout the process. He explained each treatment thoroughly, showcasing his extensive knowledge and ensuring I understood every step.  The clinic's interiors were warm and inviting, adding to the overall comfort of my visit. The results were outstanding, and I couldn't be happier with my new smile. Highly recommend Dr. Smith for his expertise and patient-centered approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently had the privilege of receiving comprehensive dental care from Dr. Aashwiin Miglani, a highly skilled periodontist and implantologist at Floss Dental Studio in Delhi. Throughout my treatment, which included Straumann German dental implants, bone grafting, root canals, a crown, and an upper jaw complete denture, Dr. Miglani consistently demonstrated his exceptional expertise, caring demeanor, and commitment to providing the best possible care.

From the initial consultation, Dr. Miglani impressed me with his thoroughness and attention to detail. He took the time to explain every step of the treatment plan, ensuring that I had a clear understanding of the procedures involved. His ability to communicate complex dental concepts in a patient-friendly manner was truly commendable, putting my mind at ease and instilling confidence in the proposed treatment.

One aspect that truly stood out during my time with Dr. Miglani was his commitment to providing prompt appointments and addressing any concerns or issues promptly. Despite his busy schedule, he always ensured that I received timely care and attention. This level of responsiveness greatly contributed to my overall positive experience and made me feel like a valued patient.

The clinic environment at Floss Dental Studio is calm, soothing, and designed to promote patient comfort. The entire staff, including Dr. Miglani, displayed a genuine concern for my well-being. Their caring behavior created a welcoming atmosphere and eliminated any anxiety I had about undergoing complex dental procedures.

Moreover, the strict sterilization protocols followed at Floss Dental Studio deserve special mention. Dr. Miglani and his team demonstrated an unwavering commitment to maintaining the highest standards of hygiene and cleanliness. I felt reassured knowing that my safety and well-being were their top priorities.

Dr. Miglani's problem-solving skills were exceptional. Throughout the course of my treatment, he addressed any challenges or complications that arose with a calm and composed demeanor. His ability to adapt and find solutions was truly remarkable, resulting in successful outcomes and minimizing any potential discomfort.

In conclusion, my experience with Dr. Aashwiin Miglani at Floss Dental Studio was nothing short of outstanding. His caring nature, detailed treatment plan explanations, prompt appointments, problem-solving skills, calm clinic environment, and strict sterilization protocols are a testament to his professionalism and commitment to patient care. I wholeheartedly recommend Dr. Miglani to anyone seeking exceptional periodontal and implantology services in Delhi.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: \"I recently had a wonderful experience at Floss Dental Studio with Dr. Aashwiin Miglani and Dr. Smruti Miglani. The clinic has a very warm and cafe-like environment that immediately put me at ease. During my cleaning, polishing, and whitening session, both Dr. Aashwiin and Dr. Smruti provided exceptional care. Their expertise, gentle approach, and attention to detail are truly commendable. Not only did my teeth look and feel amazing after the session, but the overall experience was pleasant and comfortable. I highly recommend Floss Dental Studio and the exceptional services provided by Dr. Aashwiin and Dr. Smruti. Thank you for the great work and inviting atmosphere!\

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Very satisfying experience 
In all manner,
 Great Doctor & do treatment which is really required , explaining all details & very good in his job & all his team also Thanks. 
God Bless

Dr. Aashwiin Miglani is an excellent Periodontist and Implantologist who provided me with outstanding dental care. I had dental implants placed in my lower jaw and underwent Gum therapy for my bleeding gums. Dr. Miglani was extremely professional, knowledgeable, and caring throughout the entire process.

The dental studio had a cozy and comfortable ambiance with a touch of coffee-like vibe that made me feel relaxed during my visits. The equipment and facilities were top-notch and maintained to a high standard of hygiene.

Moreover, I was delighted to experience pain-free dental treatment, which was a significant relief, considering my fear of dental procedures. Dr. Miglani made sure to explain every step of the treatment and answered all my queries patiently, which helped me to feel at ease.

Overall, I would highly recommend Dr. Aashwiin Miglani to anyone seeking dental implants or gum therapy. His expertise, caring demeanor, and the pleasant ambiance of the dental studio make for a great experience. I'm happy to have found a dentist who genuinely cares about my dental health and wellbeing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I recently visited Floss Dental Studio and was thoroughly impressed with my experience. The periodontist on staff was incredibly knowledgeable and attentive to my needs, especially when it came to issues with gum coverage. The cleaning I received was also top-notch, leaving my teeth feeling fresh and healthy.

But what really stood out to me was the warmth and care shown by the doctors Aashwini Miglani and Smruti Miglani. They were both incredibly sweet and made me feel comfortable throughout my visit. I truly appreciated their attentiveness and compassion.

And I have to mention the ambiance of Floss Dental Studio - it's truly the best I have seen in any dental clinic. The modern decor and soothing atmosphere immediately put me at ease, and I felt relaxed throughout my appointment.

Overall, I highly recommend Floss Dental Studio for anyone in need of dental care. The expertise of the staff, coupled with the caring and welcoming environment, make it a top-notch choice for anyone seeking dental services

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Zirconia Crowns,Root Canal Treatment (RCT),Dental Implant,
review:
I recently received dental implants, root canals, and crowns from Dr. Aashwiin and Dr Smruti Miglani , and I cannot express how grateful I am for his expertise and care. From the very first consultation, Dr. Aashwiin took the time to explain the entire process and answer all of my questions in detail, putting my mind at ease.

Throughout the procedures, Dr. Aashwiin Miglani and Dr Smruti Miglani was attentive, gentle, and made sure I was comfortable at all times. ** *** ********* *************, and I felt confident in his ability to handle any issues that arose during the treatments. The results of the work he did were outstanding and surpassed my expectations.

In addition to his excellent clinical skills, Dr. Aashwiin had a great chairside manner and made me feel like a valued patient. The entire staff at the clinic was also friendly, welcoming, and professional, which made my experience even better.

Overall, I highly recommend floss dental studio and dr Aashwiin  for anyone in need of dental implants, root canals, or crowns. He is an exceptional periodontist, and I am grateful to have had him as my dentist.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Tooth Air Polishing,Scaling / Polishing,Dental Examinations,Smile Design,
review:
I went in crying, and left with a big smile on my face. Dr. Miglani instantly put me at ease by going through what needed to be done and the procedure. The fear of pain associated with any kind of dental visit was dispelled when Dr. Miglani, and his wife, also a dentist, walked me through  the steps they would take to ensure minimal discomfort during the treatment. All I can say is that the treatment was pain free😊, and performed to the highest level of proficiency. 
Floss Dental Studio is clean, well ventilated and has all the necessary precautions in place to ensure a safe and virus free environment. The pleasant addition to my experience was the classical music being played in the background which made this more like a relaxing visit to the spa rather than a dental appointment 😌
I would highly recommend Floss Dental Studio and Dr.Miglani and his wife, especially during this pandemic  when hygiene and sanitation is at the top of anyone's list when visiting a dentist.
reply_text: Thank you so much for the kind review!! We really appreciate the feedback and look forward to serving you again!!

The procedure was so comfortable, and the results are beyond what I hoped for. His expertise and thoughtful care created an environment where I felt completely at ease. If you're contemplating any dental treatment, I wholeheartedly recommend placing your trust in him!

Dear Dr. Aashwiin
I wanted to express my sincere appreciation for the exceptional care and professionalism you've provided during my recent dental visits. The dedication and skill you consistently display are truly commendable.
 You have made my dental implant experiences comfortable and stress free . Your ability to explain procedures and treatment options in a clear and reassuring manner is greatly valued.

Your patient
Alka Obheroi

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: My experience at floss dental was truly transformative. Dr. Aashwin and Dr. Smruti not only enhanced my smile with a crown but also made me feel comfortable throughout the process. My confidence has soared, and I can't thank them enough for the personalized care. Highly recommend for anyone seeking both professional skill and a warm atmosphere

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I am impressed with the way my wisdom tooth extraction was done. It was almost painless procedure  as if done with magical hands. Pre extraction care & knowledge sharing was perfectly done to my satisfaction. I followed the instructions and now I feel normal. I am 58 years old and it was my first tooth extraction. I had many apprehensions before tooth extraction, but I never thought it would be that simple.
My blessings for both the doctors Mr. & Mrs MIGLANI who attended me very nicely and cured me.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
I have been visiting Dr. Aashwiin for about 8 months. Firstly, extraction of my tooth was done by him making me feel the minimum pain. As suggested and explained by him about the need for implantation of the teeth, I got dental implant fixing done which I also felt will be beneficial for me in the years to come.

He alongwith his cheerful wife were quite friendly and proficient in their work and also in sending messages for follow-up visits. There is patience and perfection in his work and he will not give up unless he himself is satisfied.

Clinic is being sanitized and kept neat and clean. I would recommend him for any dental problems. You will thank me once you visit him.

Padma Kannan

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: I visited Dr Aashwiin with an extremely painful wisdom teeth. he arranged for extraction and took care of the other wisdom tooth with RCT. he not only kept follow-ups virtually but also made sure whatever treatment was given to me was properly explained. x rays were shared over practo app and whenever we visited proper hygiene was taken care of. during covid 19 situation it was a little difficult but doctor made sure everything was properly sanatized ..it was overall an excellent experience with 100% results.thankyou doctor :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
